thread.title: Police searching for missing 81-year-old man
thread.title_full: Police searching for missing 81-year-old man - Winnipeg Free Press

author: winnipegfreepress.com
title: Police searching for missing 81-year-old man
text:
Winnipeg police are searching for an 81-year-old missing man suffering from dementia.
Charles McKane was last seen at his apartment in the 200 block of Queen Street around 8 p.m. Saturday. He is known to frequent the St. James Legion at 1755 Portage Avenue.
SUBMITTED PHOTO
Charles McKane, 81, was last seen at his apartment around 8 p.m. Sept. 12.
McKane is 6-1 tall and weighs about 175 pounds. He was wearing a light grey sweater.
Anyone with information on McKane's whereabouts should contact the Winnipeg Police Service at 204-986-6250.
 History Updated on Sunday, September 13, 2015 at 7:55 PM CDT: Adds description of McKane.
